page.title: 16Clubs & Facilities - Longnor
page.content:
In Longnor there is an over 60s club. They play dominoes, Bingo, whist, etc. They also gossip while they are having a cup of tea. This club is held every other Thursday. Trips are held for the over 60s. This club has been running to 3 or 4 years.
The British Legion take people out on trips and at Christmas-time they give the old people 5 pounds each.
The old people get a free chiropody service every month. A doctor also visits the town four times a week. There is a taxi which takes people to hospital. It costs 10 pence per mile. It was funded by the E.E.C.
There is a mobile library van which comes to Longnor.
